abstract: Just sex--Father figure--Let's get it on
description: Episode number 3 of Series "This life". 'Just sex': Egg discovers his father has written a novel. Milly is spending all her time with O'Donnell on the Pemberton case and Warren meets Ferdy, a leather clad motorcyle courier whom he falls for, only to discover Ferdy's about to get married. 'Father figure': Milly becomes even more infatuated with O'Donnell after he fights off an aggressive rollerblader. Egg discusses his concerns about his and Milly's relationship to his therapist and finally reads his father's novel. Miles defends a man charged with exposing himself in the back yard. Anna and Jerry kiss. 'Let's get it on': Anna and Jerry commence a fling, go clubbing, and Egg hits the roof. Jerry lives out a fantasy to take ecstasy but it will come back to haunt Anna. Jerry signs a book contract and the house have a party to celebrate.
